value.title: Run:AI Achieves Red Hat Certification for OpenShift
value.excerpt: AI, creator of the first cloud-native compute orchestration platform for AI, announced today the completion of certification for their Red Hat OpenShift Operator. The certification enables companies using Graphics Processing Units (GPUs) on OpenShift-managed Kubernetes clusters to more quickly and simply install Run:AI's software.

value.title: Intel expands AI career education program to 18 community colleges
value.excerpt: Program will teach data collection, computer vision and AI model training to community college students in 11 states.

value.title: Upcoming Pixel 6 and 6 Pro will run Google's own AI-focused Tensor chip
value.excerpt: Google's Pixel 5 smartphone was surprisingly unambitious, an affordable mid-ranger rather than a high-end flagship, prompting some to ask if the company was quietly planning to step back from manufacturing its own Android handsets.

value.title: Google equips Pixel 6 with its own chip to exploit AI to the max
value.excerpt: For the first time, Google will outfit its new Pixel 6 smartphone with a chip manufactured by the company and designed specifically to exploit artificial intelligence to the maximum degree possible, above all in the areas of photography and voice recognition.

value.title: OpenAI debuts Python-based Triton for GPU-powered machine learning
value.excerpt: OpenAI, the nonprofit venture whose professed mission is the ethical advancement of artificial intelligence (AI), has released the first version of the Triton language, an open source project that allows researchers to write GPU-powered deep learning projects without needing to know the intricacies of GPU programming for machine learning.

value.title: Why the Pixel 6's Tensor chip is actually a big deal (and why it isn’t)
value.excerpt: The Google Tensor SoC sets the Pixel 6 up as an artificial intelligence powerhouse, but that's not the only thing to consider.

value.title: Nvidia is tracking more than 8,500 AI startups with $60B in funding
value.excerpt: Nvidia is tracking more than 8,500 AI startups through its Inception AI startup program. Those companies have raised more than $60 billion.

value.excerpt: The ‘SEED Lab’ will allows students and faculty members at KLE Tech to jointly work on research and development projects under the mentorship of s..

value.title: Elon Musk’s Old Pals Invest in Neuralink to Fund Testing Brain Chips in Humans
value.excerpt: Elon Musk has rounded up his old friends from PayPal and Open AI days to fund his brain-computer interface startup Neuralink’s next phase of experiments to test implantable brain chips in humans and take the company’s first product to market.

value.title: OpenAI debuts Python-based Triton for GPU-powered machine learning
value.excerpt: Triton 1.0 uses Python (3.6 and up) as its base. The developer writes code in Python using Triton’s libraries, which are then JIT-compiled to run on the GPU. This allows integration with the rest of the Python ecosystem,

value.title: Intel, Ministry of Education launch 'AI For All' in India
value.excerpt: Chip maker Intel on Thursday partnered with Central Board of School Education (CBSE), Ministry of Education to announce the launch of an initiative -- 'AI For All' -- that aims to create a basic understanding of Artificial Intelligence (AI) for everyone in India.

value.title: Chipmaker Ampere to acquire AI startup OnSpecta
value.excerpt: Chipmaker Ampere on Wednesday announced its plan to acquire OnSpecta, a startup whose software accelerates AI inference workloads in the cloud and the edge. The terms of the deal were not disclosed. OnSpecta,

value.title: IBM upgrades its Big Iron OS for better cloud, security, and AI support
value.excerpt: IBM continues to fine-tune its mainframe to keep it attractive to enterprise users interested in keeping the Big Iron in their cloud and AI-application development plans. The company released a new version of the mainframe operating system— z/OS V2.

value.title: Qualcomm Stakes Beachhead In Artificial Intelligence With Foxconn Gloria AI Edge Box
value.excerpt: Powered by Qualcomm’s Cloud AI 100 solution, the system is design to support up to 24 high-definition cameras for video analytics applications like traffic analysis, security monitoring and smart retail spaces.

value.title: Semiconductor Chips: Small Tech, Big Impact
value.excerpt: Other than a cellphone or computer, it might have been difficult to believe before that something as small as a computer chip figures so prominently in our everyday lives. Or how the lack thereof could bring entire industries to a virtual standstill.

value.title: Blaize raises $71M for AI edge hardware
value.excerpt: Blaize, a startup developing AI hardware and software to accelerate computing workloads, has raised $71 million.

value.title: Wiliot raises $200M as it preps a SaaS pivot, licensing its ultra-light, ambient-power chip technology to third parties

value.title: MediaTek Launched Kompanio 1300T Chip For Tablets And ChromeBooks
value.excerpt: The new MediaTek Kompanio 1300T chip is already out. The first products powered by this chip will hit the market in the coming months.

value.title: With post-pandemic AI, we’ve now stepped into the Age of Acceleration
value.excerpt: AI is entering take-off mode just as we exit an economic downturn caused by the pandemic. Get ready for a productivity boom.

value.title: MediaTek Dimensity 1300T Gaming Chip May Be Unveiled On July 26
value.excerpt: The Dimensity 1300T gaming chip should outrun the Snapdragon 870. Though there is nothing official yet, it should come on July 26.

value.title: OnePlus Nord 2 unveiled with Dimensity 1200 AI, 50MP camera and more
value.excerpt: OnePlus has announced the OnePlus Nord 2 with Dimensity 1200 AI SoC, 50MP camera with OIS, and 65W fast-charging.

value.title: Cadence Design Systems launches Cerebrus machine learning for chip design
value.excerpt: Cadence Design Systems is using machine learning in its Cerebrus Intelligent Chip Explorer tool for designing complex chips.
